Description:
Skills:
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact with guests and handle inquiries and reservations efficiently.
- Strong organizational skills to handle multiple reservations simultaneously and ensure accuracy of information.
- Attention to detail to ensure correct room bookings, special requests, and guest preferences are properly recorded.
- Knowledge of reservation systems and software to efficiently process bookings and generate reports.
- Ability to work under pressure meet deadlines, especially during peak seasons.
- Customer service-oriented mindset to provide a pleasant and memorable experience for guests.
- Problem-solving skills to handle guest complaints or issues regarding bookings and reservations.
- Time management skills to prioritize tasks and ensure smooth operations.
- Proficiency in using computers, including MS Office applications, and familiarity with hotel management software.
- Teamwork skills to collaborate with colleagues in other departments such as front desk and housekeeping to ensure a seamless guest experience.Job Details
